bill_title: provide that counties shall require certain requirements for wind energy facility decommissioning.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide that counties shall require certain requirements for wind energy facility decommissioning. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 11-2 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: A county that adopts an ordinance under § 11-2-17.3 for a wind energy facility as defined under § 49-41B-2 shall require in addition to any other process under § 11-2-17.5, a bond, guarantee, insurance, or other requirement to provide funding for the decommissioning and removal of the wind energy facility with a combined megawatt capability of the facility's turbines of less than one hundred megawatts of electricity, and for the restoration and reversion of the land on which the facility is located to its previous use. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
